section.title: Importing, Exporting, and Resetting the Datastore
section.para: The Automate Model can be exported and imported as a YAML file. CloudForms Management Engine allows you to back up your model by export. Red Hat may provide you with new or updated classes, and provides an import function for either a class or the entire model. Finally, you can reset the datastore to its default. Always be sure to export the current datastore before importing or resetting.
